results.definition: material consisting of seed coverings and small pieces of stem or leaves that have been separated from the seeds
a variable yellow tint; dull yellow, often diluted with white
a thin paper or plastic tube used to suck liquids into the mouth
cover or provide with or as if with straw
examples: cows were strawed to weather the snowstorm

results.definition: of a pale yellow color like straw; straw-colored
plant fiber used e.g. for making baskets and hats or as fodder
